search_pro: Are you looking for a professional?
choose_user_text: Search and select the user you want to send the post to
profile_screen_received_advice: Contact your professionals to have digitally your programs, your training schedules, your reports and much more!
create_post_advice_body:
By clicking on the "Continue" button the post will be saved as a draft and you can start inserting the various sections.
Remember to insert the main image of your post before continuing, otherwise we will use the default image of Sanity!
empty_section:
- Write your text
- Upload your video or a video from YouTube
- Upload your images and your audio files
- Sign your section!
empty_section_mobile: Add your text and your personal files and click the icon on the top right to see the review of your section
login_error: Error incorrect login, email or password
email_already_used:
Email already registered. Try another email,
 or go to the login screen!
enter_document_description: To verify the genuineness of the professionals registered on our platform, we ask registered users to upload their CV and degree certification
error_document:
Something went wrong while uploading your documents.
Please try again later or contact support
signin_description_title:
Enter the requested information to complete your professional profile!

To allow patients to find you quickly, enter your skills or specializations in the field below (physiotherapist, personal trainer, nutritionist, etc.)
signin_description_body: Tell us about you and your professional career. The description entered will be visible to users when they view your profile (optional)
is_doctor_question: Are you a health professional, doctor or sports trainer?
follow_footer: Follow Sanity on its social channels
Sanity_angel_desc: Sanity Angel is the ideal package for a single professional or group who want to have an exclusive package at an advantageous price. Please contact us for more informations by clicking on the link below
subscription_message: You can cancel your subscription when you want in the "Subscription" section
checkout_error_message: There was an error at checkout
subscription_error_message: In case of error, wait a few moments and try the purchase again. For more problems you can contact the support in the appropriate section
attention_message_title: Warning, there are unsaved changes. They will be lost when you exit
pubblish_message: Choose how to publish the program
isempty_error: Upload at least one section to proceed with the publication of the program
delete_sub_body: By clicking on the "Continue" button you will cancel your current subscription. Are you sure you want to proceed?
no_create_post_body:
You have reached the limit of published/draft posts.
If you want to create new posts, go to the "Subscription" section and subscribe to Sanity Pro!
no_followed_post_list: There are no posts from followed users
error_upload: There was an error. Please try again
description_free: Create up to 3 innovative content or drafts and upgrade later when you feel ready
description_pro: Subscribe to Sanity annually and use the innovative Sanity platform with no limits. You can unsubscribe if and when you want
description_angel: Are you a company with more than one professional, are you a professional with innovative ideas or have you a code to enter? Click here!
description_new_model:
Create a new post,
choose your own sections!
description_upload_draft:
If you saved a post as a draft 
and want to upload it, click here!
redeem_text: In this section you can redeem the personalized programs, created especially for you: in the section below enter the code that you received, and press enter. You will find your new post in the "Created by me" section in the profile screen
redeem_success: You have successfully redeemed the post
redeem_failed: Failed to redeem content. Please try again
text_alert_code: Your patients will only be able to obtain the program if they have the code. Once registered with Sanity, they will be able to redeem it in the "Redeem code" section in the settings
warning_alert_code: BE CAREFUL! Remember to copy the code before confirming. Once this section is closed, the code will no longer be recoverable
error_dimension_video: Size too big: upload the video to youtube, copy the link and paste it into the 'youtube video' element
draft_error: The draft cannot be generated, please try again
